heading: HB04950
0: AN ACT GRANTING SECURITY OF TENURE UNDER CERTAIN CONDITIONS TO GOVERNMENT EMPLOYEES WHOSE NATURE OF APPOINTMENT IS EITHER TEMPORARY OR CONTRACTUAL AND  WHO HAVE RENDERED A TOTAL OF FIVE YEARS OF EFFICIENT SERVICE
